aalinkadreport.message: Find out more about the Acceptable Ads program.
aalinkadreport.description: Acceptable Ads link message on ad report page

aamessageadreport.message: If you'd rather not see ads like this one, you may want to leave the Acceptable Ads filter list turned off.
aamessageadreport.description: Acceptable Ads message on ad report page

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_con.description: message on the filter tab - Generic filter list download error message

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_inv.message: Failed, not a valid filters list
ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_inv.description: message on the filter tab - Invalid filter list file
message on the filter tab - Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL

acceptable_ads_content_blocking_disbled_.message: We unsubscribed you from Acceptable Ads because you turned on Safari Content Blocking. You can only select one at a time. ([[Why?]])
acceptable_ads_content_blocking_disbled_.description: Warning shown when Safari Content Blocking is enabled while the Acceptable Ads filter list was already enabled.

acceptableadsdisable_done.message: You're no longer subscribed to the Acceptable Ads filter list.
acceptableadsdisable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling Acceptable Ads via update page.

acceptableadsdisable_how_to_reenable.message: You can turn this back on and support the websites you love by selecting "Allow some non-intrusive advertising" below.
acceptableadsdisable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling Acceptable Ads via update page.

ad_report_please.message: Hvis du ser en annonse, ikke send en feilrapport. Send en [[annonserapport]] i stedet!
ad_report_please.description: Link to the ad report page on our support site. This is found on the Support tab of the options.

adalreadyblocked.description: On the ad report page, telling a user there is nothing to do

adblock_click_for_details.description: Tooltip on the AdBlock button, to help users understand that they can click the button, and that they can control the number badge that appears on the button.

adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.message: AdBlock vil ikke kjøre på disse sidene:
adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.description: Message displayed when the whitelister dialog will whitelist part of an entire website, for example '*.google.com/reader/*'.  The URL will appear on the next line.

adblockinglist.description: List for subscribed ad blocking fiters

adblockreportinganad.description: Title of the ad report page

adblockupdates.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options

adreport_all_debug_info.message: The following information will also be included in the ad report.
adreport_all_debug_info.description: Shows the user the debug information that will be sent along with their report.

adreport_email.description: Label for a textbox where the user enters their email address to submit a bug or ad report.

adreport_email_privacy.message: We'll only use this to contact you if we need more information.
adreport_email_privacy.description: Let the user know that their email address won't be used for reasons other than contacting them about their bug or ad report.

adreport_filter.message: If you have created a working filter using the "block an ad" wizard, paste it in the box below:
adreport_filter.description: Optional question on the ad report page when the ad needs to be reported to AdBlock.

adreport_laststep.message: Last step: report the issue to us.
adreport_laststep.description: Heading on the ad report page. Shown when the ad needs to be reported to AdBlock, and not filter list maintainers.

adreport_location.message: Exactly where on that page is the ad? What does it look like?
adreport_location.description: Question on the ad report page asking the user to describe the ad and its location on a webpage.

adreport_missing_info.message: Required information is missing or invalid.  Please fill in the questions that have a red border.
adreport_missing_info.description: Error message shown when the user doesn't enter anything in some of the text fields.

adreport_missing_screenshot.message: You forgot to attach a screenshot! We can't help you without seeing the ad(s) you're reporting.
adreport_missing_screenshot.description: Error message shown when the user doesn't attach a screenshot to an ad report.

adreport_name.description: Label for a textbox where the user enters their name (or nickname) to submit a bug or ad report.

adreport_response_file_name.message: That file name is too long. Please give your file a shorter name.
adreport_response_file_name.description: Error message shown when the file name of an attachement the user is trying to submit in a report is longer than 255 characters.

adreport_response_invalid_file.message: That's not an image file. Please upload a .png, .gif, or .jpg file.
adreport_response_invalid_file.description: Error message shown when the user uploads an invalid file type.

adreport_response_large_file.message: That file is too big. Please make sure your file is less than 10 MB.
adreport_response_large_file.description: Error message shown when the user tries to upload a large image file.

adreport_response_save_error.description: Error message shown when the server could not save an attached file.

adreport_response_success.message: All set! We'll be in touch as soon as we can. In the meantime, look for an email from AdBlock. You'll find a link to your ticket on our help site there, along with some self-help suggestions if we can't get back to you right away.
adreport_response_success.description: Shown when a ticket has been sumbitted to AdBlock's support site successfully.

adreport_screen_cap_upload.description: Label next to a file upload button.

adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.description: Error message shown when the server has an unrecoverable error during the submission of an ad or bug report.

adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.message: And manually create a ticket, and copy and paste the information below into the "Fill in any details you think will help us understand your issue" section.
adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.description: Error message shown when the server has an unrecoverable error during the submission of an ad or bug report.

adreport_server_response_error_msg.message: There was an error processing your request.
adreport_server_response_error_msg.description: Error message shown when an new ticket is sumbitted for an ad or bug report, and the server had an issue while processing the data.

adreportintro.message: Found an ad on a web page? We'll help you find the right place to report it!
adreportintro.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page

adreportthanks.description: Message to the user thanking them for sharing the URL with us.

adreportvoluntary.message: Reporting ads is voluntary. It helps other people by enabling the filter list maintainers to block the ad for everyone. If you're not feeling altruistic right now, that's okay. Close this page and [[block the ad]] just for yourself.
adreportvoluntary.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page

advanced_options2.message: Jeg er en erfaren bruker, vis meg avanserte innstillinger
advanced_options2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

all_youtube_channels_complete.message: All of your YouTube™ channel subscriptions have been whitelisted
all_youtube_channels_complete.description: Alert message displayed after the whitelisting of all subscribed YouTube channels has been completed

allow_ads_all_youtube_channels.message: Allow ads on all subscribed YouTube™ channels
allow_ads_all_youtube_channels.description: Toolbar button menu entry, displayed only on youtube.com/feed/subscriptions and if the YouTube channel whitelisting option is enabled

allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels.message: Allow whitelisting of specific YouTube™ channels (requires restarting your browser)
allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

betalabel.description: Label for beta features in AdBlock Options

blacklistclickmessage.message: Høyreklikk på en annonse på en side for å blokkere den -- eller blokker den manuelt her.
blacklistclickmessage.description: Message at the top of the blacklist options tab

blacklisterblockedelement.description: Tells the user what the blocked element is on the slider page

blacklisterblocksalloftype.message: Vær forsiktig: Dette filteret blokkerer alle $elementtype$-elementer på siden!
blacklisterblocksalloftype.description: Warns the user that all elements of type X will be blocked

blacklistereditfilter.message: Venligst skriv det korrekte filteret nedenfor og trykk OK
blacklistereditfilter.description: Text if the user wants to manually edit a filter. 'OK' is the standard javascript popup button text.

blacklistereditinvalid1.description: Messagebox if the manually edited filter is invalid. Error messages are not translated.

blacklistermatches.message: Det samsvarer med $matchcount$ elementer på denne siden.
blacklistermatches.description: Tells the user multiple matches were found

blacklisternofilter.description: Warning if the user hasn't specified a filter

blacklisteroptions1.message: Tror du dette vil være sant om annonsen hver gang du besøker denne siden?

blacklisteroptionstitle.message: Siste steg: Hva gjør dette til en annonse?

blacklistersinglematch.message: Det samsvarer med ett element på denne siden.
blacklistersinglematch.description: Tells the user only one match was found

blacklisterthefilter.message: Filteret, som kan bli forandret under innstillingssiden:

blacklisterwarningnofilter.description: Warns the user that no filter was specified

block_ads_on_youtube.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether to block ads on youtube.com

block_an_ad_on_this_page.message: Blokker en annonse på denne siden
block_an_ad_on_this_page.description: Toolbar button menu entry and context menu entry

block_annonyances_on_youtube.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether to block annonyances on youtube.com (such as comments, suggested videos, annotations, and recommended channels)

block_privacy_on_youtube.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether to block privacy-related requests on youtube.com

blockanadtitle.description: Title of the first two dialogs of the blacklister

blockdomain.message: Domenet til siden den skal påvirke
blockdomain.description: Message of the url and css -blocking area

blocked_ads.description: Title for popup menu section showing number of ads blocked

blocked_n_in_total.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked since AdBlock was installed. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999.

count.example: The number of ads blocked. Do not make any changes to this placeholder when translating.

blocked_n_on_this_page.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked on this page. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999.

count.example: The number of ads blocked. Do not make any changes to this placeholder when translating.

blockurlwithtext.message: Blokker URLer som inneholder denne teksten

browserestartrequired.message: Please restart Safari to finish turning off content blocking.
browserestartrequired.description: Displayed after disabling Safari Content Blocking, which requres a browser relaunch

bugreport.message: Why don't you send us a [[bug report]]?
bugreport.description: Link to send a bug report on the Support tab of the options

buttonback.description: Back to previous wizard page button

buttonexclude.description: Button for excluding a domain in the whitelister dialog

cantblockflash.message: Vi kan ikke blokkere annonser inni Flash og andre objekter enda. Vi venter på støtte fra nettleseren og WebKit.
cantblockflash.description: Result of the final ad report question

cantblockflashwarning.message: Vises annonsen i eller før en film eller hvilket som helst annet objekt som et Flash-spill?
cantblockflashwarning.description: Text of the final ad report question

checkinfirefox_1.message: Installer Firefox hvis du ikke har det.
checkinfirefox_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_2.message: Install Adblock Plus for Firefox if you don't have it.
checkinfirefox_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'Adblock Plus'.

checkinfirefox_3.message: I den nettleseren, abonner på de samme filterlistene som her.
checkinfirefox_3.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_4.message: I den nettleseren, last inn nettsiden med annonsen.
checkinfirefox_4.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_5.message: Vises reklamen også i den nettleseren?
checkinfirefox_5.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefoxorchrome_1.message: Install Firefox or Chrome if you don't have it.
checkinfirefoxorchrome_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox or Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefoxorchrome_2.message: Install Adblock Plus for Firefox or AdBlock for Chrome if you don't have it.
checkinfirefoxorchrome_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'Adblock Plus'.

checkinfirefoxorchrometitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox/Chrome

checkinfirefoxtitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox

chromebutton_how_to_hide2.message: Right-click the AdBlock button and select 'Hide in Chrome Menu'. To show it, click the Chrome menu, right-click the AdBlock button, and select 'Keep in Toolbar'.
chromebutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Chrome displays when you right click a toolbar button.

cleanuplist2.description: Option at the bottom of the 'Customize' options tab

clickdisableotherextensions.message: ELLER så kan du bare klikke på denne knappen, så fikser vi alt: [[Deaktiver alle andre utvidelser]]
clickdisableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, an alternative way to disable other extensions

clickhide_instructions.message: Klikk (eller høyreklikk) på et element på siden etter at du har lukket dette vinduet.

clickthead.message: Klikk på annonsen, så hjelper jeg deg med å blokkere den.
clickthead.description: When you have to click the ad to continue

close.description: Generic message for buttons that close a view or window

confirm_undo_custom_filters.message: Er du sikker på at du vil ta bort $count$ blokkeringene som du har fjernet på $host$?
confirm_undo_custom_filters.description: Confirmation message when user wants to undo their custom blocks for a domain. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999, $host$ will be the domain where the custom blocks will be reset.

count.example: The number of custom blocks for a domain.

content_blocking_acceptable_ads_disbled_.message: We turned off Safari Content Blocking because you opted to allow non-intrusive ads. You can only select one at a time. ([[Why?]])
content_blocking_acceptable_ads_disbled_.description: Warning shown when the Acceptable Ads filter list is enabled while Safari Content Blocking was already enabled.

contentblockingwarning.message: Note:  Whitelisting (allowing ads on) a page or site is not supported with Safari Content Blocking enabled.
contentblockingwarning.description: Notice shown on the 'Customize' tab of the options page when Safari Content Blocking is enabled

contributors.message: We've got a page to help you find out the [[people behind AdBlock]], as well!
contributors.description: Link to the contributors page on the Support tab of the options

correctfilters.message: Make sure you're using the right language filter(s):
correctfilters.description: On the ad report page, label describing having the right set of filters

custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.description: Part one of a message shown to users on the 'Customize' tab after invalid custom filters have been migrated

custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.message: The following message(s) were generated during the custom filter migration (ignore the line numbers):
custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.description: Part two of a message shown to users on the 'Customize' tab after invalid custom filters have been migrated
Part three of a message shown to users on the 'Customize' tab after invalid custom filters have been migrated

customfilters.description: List for custom filters the user subscribed to

customfilterserrormessage.description: Error message when there is an issue with a custom filter on the 'Customize' tab of the Options page

datacollectionoption.message: Allow AdBlock to collect anonymous filter list usage data, and information about content blocked by filter lists
datacollectionoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

debuginfo.message: Har vårt team etterspurt feilsøkingsinfo? Klikk [[her]] for det!
debuginfo.description: Users can click this link to provide debug information to AdBlock staff

debuginlogoption.message: Show debug statements in Console Log (which slows down the extension)
debuginlogoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

delete_migration_error_messages.description: Button to delete error messages when adding custom filters manually

description.message: Den mest populære Chrome utvidelsen med over 40 millioner brukere! Blokkerer annonser over hele internett.
description.description: Extension description in manifest. Should not exceed 132 characters.

description2.message: Den mest populære Chrome utvidelsen med over 40 millioner brukere! Blokkerer annonser over hele internett.
description2.description: Extension description in manifest. Should not exceed 132 characters.

description_edge.message: AdBlock. The #1 ad blocker with over 200 million downloads. Blocks ads all over the web.
description_edge.description: Description for the AdBlock for Edge extension. Should not exceed 132 characters.

description_yt.message: The only YouTube™ ad blocker built by AdBlock, the most popular Chrome extension with 60 million users worldwide
description_yt.description: Description for the AdBlock on YouTube extension. Should not exceed 132 characters.

disableaa.description: Section header on the ad report page

disableallextensions.message: Disable all extensions except for AdBlock:

disabled_by_filter_lists.message: Beklager, AdBlock er deaktivert på denne siden av en av dine filerlister.
disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list

disabled_by_filter_lists_yt.message: Sorry, AdBlock on YouTube™ is disabled on this page by one of your options.
disabled_by_filter_lists_yt.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list. Specific to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

disabled_for_these_domains.message: AdBlock er deaktivert for domenene listet nedenfor. Du kan legge til et domene enten ved å trykke på AdBlock-ikonet i adressefeltet, eller ved å skrive inn domenet (ikke URL-en) i boksen og deretter klikke på "Legg til domene"-knappen.

disabled_on_this_channel.message: You allowed ads on this channel.
disabled_on_this_channel.description: Message shown in the toolbar button menu on YouTube channel pages and videos that the user has whitelisted.

disabled_on_this_page.message: AdBlock er deaktivert på denne siden.
disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been whitelisted

disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.message: Fjern krysset ved Aktiver ved alle utvidelser unntatt for AdBlock. La AdBlock være aktivert.
disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.description: Step 2 for disabling Chrome and Safari extensions

disableforedgestepone.message: Click the More menu (...) and select Extensions.

disableforedgesteptwo.message: For each extension except for AdBlock, click the gear icon and click the On toggle button to change it to Off.

disableotherextensionscomplete.message: We've disabled all other extensions. Now we'll reload the page with the ad. One second, please.
disableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions

disableyoutubestreamingads.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page. Allow AdBlock and the ClickToFlash Safari extension to work simultaneously on YouTube.

donate_to_adblock.description: Text of a donate link in the toolbar button menu

donate_to_youtube_adblock.description: Text of a donate link in the toolbar button menu. 'This' refers to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.message: Deaktiver på sider under dette domenet
dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.description: Menu entry to open the whitelist wizard

dont_run_on_this_page.description: Menu entry to whitelist a page

easylist_disable_done.message: AdBlock uses EasyList to block ads on most websites.
easylist_disable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling EasyList via Filter List page.

easylist_disable_how_to_reenable.message: We recommend keeping it on. If you unsubscribed by accident, please select "EasyList" now to block more ads.
easylist_disable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling EasyList via Filter List page.

enable_adblock.description: Link text to un-whitelist a page, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is disabled on this page'

enable_adblock_on_this_channel.description: Menu entry to un-whitelist a YouTube channel, displayed under 'You allowed ads on this channel.'

enable_only_the.message: Aktiver kun de filterlistene du har behov for. For mange filterlister kan gjøre nettleseren treg.

enableotherextensionscomplete.message: De tidligere deaktiverte utvidelsene har blitt aktivert igjen.
enableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've re-enabled extensions that were previously disabled

englishonly.description: Lets the user know that a link/page is available in English only

excludedomainorurl.message: Domenet eller urlen hvor AdBlock ikke skal blokkere noe

ff_button_how_to_hide.message: For å skjule knappen, høyreklikk og velg Fjern fra verktøylinje. Du kan vise den igjen ved å åpne menyen og velge Tilpass.
ff_button_how_to_hide.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Remove from Toolbar' should match the text that Firefox displays when you right click a toolbar button, and 'Customize' should match the text that shows when you click the button on the Firefox toolbar with three lines.

filterantisocial.message: Antisosial filterliste (tar bort knapper for sosiale media)

filterlistlink.message: Ikke abonner på flere enn du trenger -- hver liste bremser deg ned bittelitt! Bidragsytere og flere lister finner du [[her]].

filterlistsrock.message: Filterlistene blokkerer de fleste annonsene på nettet.  Du kan også:
filterlistsrock.description: Header text on the Customize tab. 'Filter lists' should be the same text as the name of the 'Filter lists' tab.

filterorigin.description: Resource list page: tooltip of matching filter, telling which filter list contains the filter

list.example: A filter list name OR AdBlock OR the translation of 'tabcustomize'

filterrussian.description: Language names for a filter list

filtersavewarning.message:
Vær forsiktig: hvis du gjør en feil her kan mange andre filtere, inkludert de offisielle, bli ødelagt!
Les [[filtersyntax-veiledningen]] for å lære hvordan du kan legge til avanserte svarteliste- og hvitelistefiltere.

filtersavewarning_ytadblock_1.message: Be careful: if you make a mistake here, AdBlock on YouTube™ could stop working properly.
filtersavewarning_ytadblock_1.description: Warning when manually editing filters in the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

filtersavewarning_ytadblock_2.message: Read the [[filter syntax tutorial]] to learn how to add whitelist filters.
filtersavewarning_ytadblock_2.description: Warning when manually editing filters in the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

filterstabtitle.description: Title of the filter list tab

filterwarning_removal.message: Adblock Warning Removal list (removes warnings about using ad blockers)
filterwarning_removal.description: A filter list. "Adblock" is written with a lowercase B in this string as it refers to ad blocking extensions in general, not just AdBlock specifically.

findingads.message:
Finner annonser...

Dette tar bare øyeblikk.
findingads.description: When you press ctrl-shift-K the blacklister searches for ads

firefox_explanation.message: Formålet med dette spørsmålet er å avgjøre hvem som skal motta rapporten. Hvis du svarer på dette spørsmålet feil, vil rapporten sendes til feil person, så det kan bli ignorert.
firefox_explanation.description: Explanation of the Check-in-Firefox or Chrome step in the ad reporter

firstRun_abbPromotionHeadline.message: Har du en smarttelefon eller et nettbrett?

firstRun_acceptableAdsExplanation.message: Vi vil oppfordre nettsider til å bruke standard, ikke-påtrengende annonser. Derfor har vi laget strenge retningslinjer for å identifisere akseptable annonser, som vises når man har aktivert standardinnstillingene. Hvis du ønsker å blokkere alle annonser, kan du velge bort dette straks.

firstRun_acceptableAdsHeadline.message: Irriterende annonser blir fra nå av blokkert

firstRun_dataCorruptionWarning.message: Dukker denne siden stadig opp? Klikk her!

firstRun_feature_malware_description.message: Gjør nettlesingen din tryggere ved å blokkere domener som er kjent for å være skadelige.

firstRun_feature_social_description.message: Bli kvitt knapper for sosiale medier, slik som "Liker" fra Facebook, som dukker opp på nettsider og sporer handlingene dine.

firstRun_feature_tracking_description.message: Vær privat på nettet ved å hindre sporing - gjem sporene dine fra reklameselskaper som ellers registrerer alt du gjør.

firstRun_features.message: AdBlock kan gjøre mer enn å bare blokkere annonser

firstRun_filterlistsReinitializedWarning.message: Det kan se ut som at en feil i systemet gjorde at alle filtrene ble fjernet, og vi var ute av stand til å gjenopprette sikkerhetskopien. Vi har derfor måttet nullstille alle filtrene og innstillingene for Akseptable annonser. Vennligst kontroller filterlistene dine og innstillingene for Akseptable annonser i valgalternativene til AdBlock options.

firstRun_legacySafariWarning.message: Du bruker en gammel versjon av Safari som ikke støttes av AdBlock, og det kan hende AdBlock ikke fungerer, eller forverrer brukeropplevelsen på enkelte nettsteder. Vi anbefaler sterkt at du enten oppdaterer til Safari 6.1.1 eller nyere (tilgjengelig for Mac OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion), Safari 7.0.1 (tilgjengelig for OS X 10.9 Mavericks) eller nyere, eller bruker den nyeste versjonen av Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome eller Opera.

firstRun_share_headline.message: Hjelp oss med å gjøre Internett til et bedre sted

fixityourself.message: OK, du kan fremdeles blokkere denne reklamen selv, under innstillinger. Takk!
fixityourself.description: Telling users who won't report an ad to us how to handle it for themselves

flashads.description: Title of the final ad report question if the ad didn't appear in Firefox

format_site1_site2_site3.description: Example showing users how to input a list of sites on the Customize tab. You can translate the 'news' and 'siteN' but leave the '|'s and '~'s in place.

found_a_bug.message: Har du funnet en feil? Vil du oversette AdBlock til ditt eget språk? Vennligst send en forespørsel hit.

foundbug.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options

framedomain.description: Resource list page: domain name of the frame

frametype.description: Resource list page: followed by frame type (e.g. top frame, subframe)

frameurl.description: Resource list page: full URL of the frame

global_filter_elemhide_duplicate_id.message: Du kan kun angi ett ID for elementet som skal skjules

global_filter_elemhide_nocriteria.message: Du har ikke spesifisert kriterier for å gjenkjenne elementet som skal skjules

global_remove_subscription_warning.message: Ønsker du virkelig å fjerne dette abonnementet?

global_subscription_invalid_location.message: Filterlistens plassering er verken en gyldig URL eller et gyldig filnavn.

headerfilter.description: Resource list page: title of a column

headerresource.description: Resource list page: title of a column

headertype.description: Resource list page: title of a column

help_and_feedback.description: Text of the 'help' link in the toolbar button menu

here.description: This message is injected in other strings as a link/button

hide_this_button.description: Toolbar button menu entry to hide the AdBlock button

how.description: Text of a link pointing to instructions on how to do something

invalidListUrl.message: Ugyldig liste-URL. Den vil bli slettet.
invalidListUrl.description: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL

languagedropdowndescription.message: Legg til filter for et annet språk:

legend.description: Resource list page: followed by color codes for various resource statuses (e.g. blocked, whitelisted, hidden)

linkblockadbyurl.message: Blokker en annonse ved dens URL

linkhidesection.message: Skjul en del av en nettside

linkunblock.message: Vis annonser på en nettside eller domene

loading.description: Generic message displayed during processes that take some time

malwarecheck.message: Check for malware that could be injecting ads:
malwarecheck.description: Section header on the ad report page

malwarenotfound.message: Vi kan ikke finne skadevare vi kjenner igjen.
malwarenotfound.description: On the ad report page, the ads the user is seeing are probably not caused by malware/adware

malwarenotificationcheckboxmessage.message: Skal AdBlock varsle deg når skadelig programvare oppdages?
malwarenotificationcheckboxmessage.description: Checkbox displayed when subscribing to the Malware filter list on the Filter lists tab of the Options page

malwarenotificationdisablethesemessages.description: Button on the malware notification to disable future notifications. Message should be under 45 characters!

malwarenotificationlearnmore.description: Button on the malware notification that opens a page about malware on our website. Message should be under 45 characters!

malwarenotificationmessage.message: AdBlock has blocked a download from a site known to host malware.
malwarenotificationmessage.description: Notification when a malware request has been blocked. This message should be under 90 characters!

malwarewarning.message: Datamaskinen din kan være infisert av skadevare. Klikk [[her]] for mer informasjon.
malwarewarning.description: On the ad report page, the ads the user is seeing might be caused by malware/adware

manuallyenableotherextensions.message: Åpne utvidelses-siden for å aktivere utvidelser som har vært deaktivert.
manuallyenableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that they will need to manually reenable the extensions

migration_error_message.message: We've found some errors in your custom filters. See below for the messages.
migration_error_message.description: Warning when adding custom filters manually

modifydomain.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the domain part of a URL

modifypath.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the path part of a URL

name_adblock_on_youtube.description: Name of version of the AdBlock extension that only blocks ads on YouTube. Other strings that refer to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension should use this name.

new_resourcelist_explanation_osx.message: To show all requests, right click the page, select 'Inspect' (Option+Cmd+I), then select the 'AdBlock' tab.
new_resourcelist_explanation_osx.description: Message explaining how to access the resource list page on AdBlock 3.0+

new_resourcelist_explanation_win.message: To show all requests, right click the page, select 'Inspect' (Ctrl+Shift+I), then select the 'AdBlock' tab.
new_resourcelist_explanation_win.description: Message explaining how to access the resource list page on AdBlock 3.0+

no.description: A negative response to a question

nodefaultfilter1.message:
We don't have a default filter list for that language.
Please [[try to find a suitable list that supports this language]] or block this ad for yourself via the AdBlock menu.
nodefaultfilter1.description: Instructions on ad report page pointing users to EasyList subscriptions list. 'Customize' should be the same text as the name of the 'Customize' tab.

noresourcessend2.message: Something went wrong. No resources have been sent through. This page will now close. Try reloading the website.

notification_antiadblock_message.message: Dette området er kjent for å vise meldinger som henvender seg til AdBlock-brukere. Vil du at AdBlock skal skjule disse meldingene?

notification_open_all.message: Åpne alle koblinger fra denne meldingen

notification_with_buttons.message: Trykk på "OK" for å åpne alle koblingene i denne meldingen.

notification_without_buttons.message: Trykk på varselet for å åpne alle koblingene.

one_moment_all_youtube_channels.message: One moment while we gather all of your subscriptions
one_moment_all_youtube_channels.description: Alert message displayed when whitelisting all subscribed YouTube channels

only_block_ads_on_these_sites.message: Blokker kun annonser på disse sidene:
only_block_ads_on_these_sites.description: Label for textbox where user enters a list of sites on Customize tab

operabutton_how_to_hide2.message: For å fjerne knappen, gå til opera://extensions og sett en markering i boksen ved menylinjen "Skjul fra verktøylinjen" . For å vise knappen igjen må markeringen du satte ved menylinjen fjernes .
operabutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Opera displays on the Extensions page.

options.description: The text of the link on chrome://chrome/extensions that gets you to the Options page for an extension

optionstitle_yt.description: Title for the options page for the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

otherfilters.description: List for other filters the user subscribed to

pagelanguagecheck.message: Hvilket språk er siden skrevet på?

pause_adblocking.description: Menu entry to pause the extension

pwyw.description: Text of a payment request link

questionoridea.message: Har du et spørsmål eller en idé?
questionoridea.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options

reenableadsonebyone.message: Great! Now let's find out which extension is the cause. Go through and enable each extension one by one. The extension that brings back the ad(s) is the one you need to uninstall to get rid of the ads.
reenableadsonebyone.description: Tells the user to reenable the extensions one by one

refusetocheck.description: User is telling us they don't wish to investigate something for us

removefromlist.description: Label to remove a custom filter

report_ad_on_page.message: Rapporter en annonse på denne siden
report_ad_on_page.description: Entry in the AdBlock button menu

reportfilterlistproblem.message: Dette er et filterlisteproblem. Rapporter det her: $link$
reportfilterlistproblem.description: Telling the user to report an ad to a filter list maintainer

link.example: The link could point to a filter list's forum, or to the email address of a filter list maintainer. For example, forums.lanik.us or someguy@list.com.

reportpubliclyavailable.message: Merk: rapporten din kan bli offentlig tilgjengelig. Husk det før du inkluderer noe privat.
reportpubliclyavailable.description: Ad report page string, when you're about to submit a report

resourcedomain.description: Resource list page: text shown when hovering over an item in the third-party column

retryaftersubscribe.message: Abonner på denne filterlisten, og prøv igjen: $list_title$
retryaftersubscribe.description: Instructions on ad report page telling users to subscribe to a filter list and then check again to see whether the ad exists

safari50_updatenotice.message: Du bruker en gammel versjon av Safari. Få den siste versjonen for å bruke AdBlock-verktøylinjen for å pause AdBlock, hviteliste nettsider, og rapporter annonser. [[Oppdater nå]].
safari50_updatenotice.description: A message shown to Safari 5.0 users urging them to upgrade

safaributton_how_to_hide2.message: For å gjemme knappen, høyreklikk på Safaris verktøylinje og velg tilpass verktøylinje. Deretter dra AdBlockknappen ut av verktøylinjen. Du kan vise den igjen ved å dra den tilbake til verktøylinjen
safaributton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Customize Toolbar' should match the text that Safari displays in the toolbar's context menu.

safaricontentblocking.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page. 'Content Blocking' is the name of a different way of blocking resources introduced in Safari 9.

safaricontentblockinglimitexceeded.message: The number of filter list rules exceeds the 50,000 limit, and has been automatically reduced. Please unsubscribe from some filter lists or disable Safari Content Blocking!
safaricontentblockinglimitexceeded.description: Displayed when the number of rules in the subscribed filter lists is larger than the number supported by Safari Content Blocking, if that option is enabled

safaricontentblockingpausemessage.message: To pause AdBlock with Content Blocking enabled, please select Safari (in the menu bar) > Preferences > Extensions > AdBlock, and uncheck 'Enable AdBlock'.
safaricontentblockingpausemessage.description: Alert displayed after clicking 'Pause AdBlock' in the AdBlock menu while Safari Content blocking is enabled

safarinotificationbody.message: Please disable some filter lists. More information in AdBlock's Options.
safarinotificationbody.description: Body of a notification shown to Safari Content Blocking users with too many filter list rules

safarinotificationtitle.description: Title of a notification shown to Safari Content Blocking users with too many filter list rules

selectlanguage.description: Text for the first option in Langage Dropdown for Filter Lists tab in options. Include the ' -- ' on either side of your translation.

show_ads_except_for.message: Vis reklame overalt unntatt på disse domenene...
show_ads_except_for.description: Section title for blacklisting section of Customize tab

show_devtools_panel.message: Show 'AdBlock' panel in the developer tools
show_devtools_panel.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock tab should show in the developer tools window

show_on_adblock_button.message: Vis antall annonser blokkert på AdBlock-knappen
show_on_adblock_button.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked

show_on_adblock_menu.message: Vis antall annonser blokkert i AdBlock-menyen
show_on_adblock_menu.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock menu should show the number of ads blocked

show_on_button.message: Show number of ads blocked on button
show_on_button.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked

show_on_menu.message: Show number of ads blocked on menu
show_on_menu.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock menu should show the number of ads blocked

show_resourcelist.description: Menu entry to open the resource list page

showcontextmenus2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

showlinkstolists2.description: Option on the 'Filter lists' tab of the Options page

sliderexplanation.message: Drag glidebryteren helt til annonsen(e) er blokkert riktig på nettsiden, og det blokkerte elementet ser brukbart ut.

slidertitle.message: Steg 1: Finn ut hva du skal blokkere.

sourcecode.description: Link to the source code of AdBlock on the Support tab of the options

stats_share_message.message: Jeg blokkerte $number$ annonser og trackere, takket være AdBlock.

status_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is paused

storage_quota_exceeded.message: Du har brukt mer plass enn AdBlock har til rådighet! Vennligst avslutt abonnementet fra noen filterlister!
storage_quota_exceeded.description: Message shown when the user uses more storage than allowed by the browser

subscribeconfirm.message: Er du sikker på at du vil abonnere på filterlisten $title$?
subscribeconfirm.description: Prompt question before subscribing to the filter list

subscriptionSelection_subscriptionSelect.message: Vennligst velg et filterabonnement fra listen:

supportsite.message: La oss få vite det på vår [[støtteside]]!
supportsite.description: Link to the support site on the Support tab of the options

tabcustomize.description: A tab on the options page

tabfilterlists.description: A tab on the options page

tabgeneral.description: A tab on the options page

tabreloadcomplete.message: Done! We reloaded the page with the ad. Please check that page to see whether the ad is gone. Then come back to this page and answer the question below.
tabreloadcomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions

tabsupport.description: A tab on the options page

thirdparty.description: Resource list page: column title telling if the resource originates from a different domain

translator_credit.description: Will be followed by a list of translator names (separate string)

undo_last_block.message: Angre all blokkering på dette domene
undo_last_block.description: Menu entry to let the user cancel the result of running the blacklist wizard

unpause_adblock.description: Link text to unpause AdBlock, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused'

unpause_adblocking.description: Menu entry to unpause the extension

unsubscribe_from_all_confirmation.message: AdBlock can't block ads if you disable all the filter lists. We recommend pausing AdBlock instead. Unsubscribe from this list anyway?
unsubscribe_from_all_confirmation.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to unsubscribe from all filter lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.

updatenowmessage2.message: Jeg vil laste ned oppdateringer automatisk; du kan også [[oppdatere nå]]

updateyourlists.message: Make sure your filter lists are up to date:
updateyourlists.description: Section header on the ad report page

warning_overrules_filters.message:
Advarsel: på alle andre sider vil du se annonser! 
Dette overskriver alle andre filtre for disse sidene.
warning_overrules_filters.description: Message on the 'Customize' tab of the options page, explaining the danger of adding a blacklisting filter

whatmakesadblocktick.message: Vil du se hva som får AdBlock til å virke?
whatmakesadblocktick.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options

whats_this.description: Text of a link pointing to the explanation of a new feature

whatsnew.message: Hva er nytt i den siste versjonen? Se [[oppdateringloggen]]!
whatsnew.description: Link to display the changelog on the Support tab of the options

whitelist_all_youtube_channels.description: Toolbar button menu entry, displayed only on youtube.com/feed/subscriptions and if the YouTube channel whitelisting option is enabled

whitelist_youtube_channel.description: Entry in the AdBlock menu, when a user is browsing YouTube and has enabled the YouTube channel whitelisting option

whitelist_youtube_channel_v2.description: Menu entry to whitelist the channel of the current YouTube video or page. The channel name will appear on a line below this menu item.

whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the whitelister dialog

wizardcantrunonframesets.message: Denne AdBlock-funksjonen virker ikke fordi den bruker gammel teknologi. Du kan svarteliste eller hviteliste ressurser manuelt under Tilpass-fanen på Alternativer-siden.
wizardcantrunonframesets.description: Message (alert) shown when the user tries to use a blacklist/whitelist wizard on an old website

work_around_hulu_problems.message: Rett en feil som gjør at video ikke spilles på Hulu.com (krever omstart av nettleseren)
work_around_hulu_problems.description: Advanced Options page checkbox, which users only need to use if Hulu.com videos break. It directs the user to restart their browser in order for changes to the checkbox to take effect.

yes.description: A positive response to a question

you_can_slide_to_change.message: Du kan skyve under for å endre akkurat hvilke sider AdBlock ikke kjører på.
you_can_slide_to_change.description: Instructions for how to use the whitelister slider controls. Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.

you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: Jo flere lister du velger, dess tregere kjører AdBlock. Hvis du bruker for mange lister, kan nettleseren slutte å virke på noen sider. Trykk OK for å abonnere på listen uansett.
you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.

ytadblockupdates.description: Subtitle on the Support tab of the options. Specific to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.
